class scripts.core.constants.Directions[source]¶

Bases: types.SimpleNamespace

Holds a tuple for each direction of the (x, y) relative direction.

UP_LEFT = (-1, -1)¶
UP = (0, -1)¶
UP_RIGHT = (1, -1)¶
LEFT = (-1, 0)¶
CENTRE = (0, 0)¶
RIGHT = (1, 0)¶
DOWN_LEFT = (-1, 1)¶
DOWN = (0, 1)¶
DOWN_RIGHT = (1, 1)¶
